name: Fencing Royale
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam Mini Jam- 86, the theme were "Sports" and limitation was "No stopping".  All code and models were made in 72h.

You are in a fencing battle royal, the enmies never stop spawning, beating enemies can spawn a collectable, and you can upgrade the player skills.

I didnt dad time to had the tutorial the controls are below.

Controls:

WASD -> MOVE

LEFT CLICK -> ATTACK

RIGHT CLICK -> BLOCK

SPACE -> DASH

Advanced Controls:

ATTACK + SPACE -> CANCEL ATTACK

BLOCK + SPACE -> DASH FROM ENEMY
